thread.title: New Jersey Finds Challenge to Combating Addiction Crisis
thread.title_full: New Jersey Finds Challenge to Combating Addiction Crisis - WSJ

author: Kate King
title: New Jersey Finds Challenge to Combating Addiction Crisis
text:
New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie has staked his final year as governor on tackling the stateâ€™s addiction crisis, but efforts under way in the state show how difficult that task is.
Citing long waiting lists at many treatment centers, Mr. Christie wants to increase the availability of both inpatient and outpatient treatment programs. The governor has urged the state legislature to pass laws limiting the quantity of opioids doctors can...
